profile.name: Michael (Mike) Valant
profile.bio: 25+ years of engineering and management experience in a diverse range of specialties, including mechanical, electromechanical, pneumatic, cryogenic, and hydraulic design, CAD/CAM, thermo-structural FEA, multi-phase CFD modeling, rocket propulsion system design and development, cryogenic testing, rocket engine testing, automotive design, metal additive rapid manufacturing, machine tool design, various welding technologies, and other manufacturing technologies
